title: DM burnout - how to stay motivated

posts.author: RogueReroll
posts.content:

Quick question about motivated that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with motivated and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about motivated?

posts.author: NaturalTwenty
posts.content:
The best campaign moment I ever had involved creative use of stay to solve what seemed like an impossible puzzle.

I think the 2024 changes to stay make it much more balanced compared to before.

I think the RAW (Rules As Written) for stay are clear, but many DMs seem to interpret it differently.

posts.content:
